meat.p:
Hi, I'm April, aka 王奕. I am a thesis-based MSc student in the Human-Computer Interaction Lab at the School of Computing Science, Simon Fraser University, advised by Dr.Chilana. My research interests focus on using HCI techniques to lower the learning barriers for people without professional knowledge in a particular subject.

Before starting my journey in HCI research, I finished my Bachelor's degree in College of Computer Science and Technology, Zhejiang Univerisity, China. With a major in Digital Media and Network Technology, I received interdisciplinary training in multimedia processing, game engineering and human interface design.

p.news: I am currently applying to Ph.D. programs in Human-Computer Interaction!
Presented our poster on conversational programmer at ICER'17, Tacoma WA
Volunteered at SFU FAS Outreach Program to give presentations at local elememtary schools to encourage girls into coding. The girls love my presentation <3
Our paper on Social Cheatsheet is accepted to CSCW2018!
Attended CRA Women Grad Cohort Workshop 2017, Washington DC
Served as the teaching assistant for CMPT363 User Interface Design
